films: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules (2022)
The Ice Age Adventures of Buck Wild (2022)
Night at the Museum: Kahmunrah Rises Again (2022)
Diary of a Wimpy Kid Christmas: Cabin Fever (2023)
Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Last Straw (2025)
production_notes: Disney+ original animated films based on Fox/20th Century properties. Released under Walt Disney Pictures banner rather than 20th Century Studios. Animation by Bardel Entertainment (Wimpy Kid, Ice Age) and Disney Television Animation (Night at the Museum).

role_definitions.supporting: Named characters with significant screen time

diary_of_a_wimpy_kid_2021.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
diary_of_a_wimpy_kid_2021.based_on: Diary of a Wimpy Kid (Book 1) by Jeff Kinney

characters.name: Greg Heffley
characters.notes: Ambitious middle schooler with dreams of fame

characters.name: Rowley Jefferson
characters.notes: Greg's best friend, more kindhearted and innocent

characters.name: Frank Heffley
characters.notes: Greg's father, disapproves of video games

characters.name: Susan Heffley
characters.notes: Greg's mother

characters.name: Rodrick Heffley
characters.notes: Greg's older brother, loves to torment him

characters.name: Manny Heffley
characters.notes: Greg's younger brother

characters.name: Fregley
characters.notes: Weird classmate

characters.name: Chirag Gupta
characters.notes: Greg's classmate

characters.name: Homeroom Teacher
characters.notes: Fears Greg will be as bad as Rodrick

diary_of_a_wimpy_kid_rodrick_rules_2022.based_on: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules (Book 2) by Jeff Kinney

ice_age_adventures_of_buck_wild_2022.title: The Ice Age Adventures of Buck Wild
ice_age_adventures_of_buck_wild_2022.production_notes: First Ice Age film not produced by Blue Sky Studios (closed April 2021). Simon Pegg is only returning voice actor from theatrical films.

characters.name: Buck Wild
characters.notes: Only original cast member to return; one-eyed adventurer first introduced in Dawn of the Dinosaurs

characters.name: Crash
characters.notes: Ellie's adopted brother; originally voiced by Seann William Scott

characters.name: Eddie
characters.notes: Crash's twin brother; originally voiced by Josh Peck; Harris's film debut

characters.name: Orson
characters.notes: New villain; wants to take over the Lost World with his raptors

characters.name: Zee
characters.notes: New character; Buck's old friend often mistaken for a skunk

characters.name: Manny
characters.notes: Recast; originally voiced by Ray Romano

characters.name: Ellie
characters.notes: Recast; originally voiced by Queen Latifah; narrator of the film

characters.name: Sid
characters.notes: Recast; originally voiced by John Leguizamo

characters.name: Diego
characters.notes: Recast; originally voiced by Denis Leary

characters.name: Momma Dino
characters.notes: Non-speaking; Buck's nemesis from Dawn of the Dinosaurs

characters.name: Penelope
characters.notes: Buck's flying companion

night_at_the_museum_kahmunrah_rises_agai.title: Night at the Museum: Kahmunrah Rises Again
night_at_the_museum_kahmunrah_rises_agai.production_notes: First traditionally animated (2D) Disney film since Winnie the Pooh (2011). Directed by Matt Danner (Legend of the Three Caballeros).

characters.name: Nick Daley
characters.notes: Larry's teenage son; new protagonist taking over as night watchman

characters.name: Larry Daley
characters.notes: Recast; originally played by Ben Stiller in live-action films

characters.name: Laaa
characters.notes: Larry's Neanderthal doppelganger; also voiced by Levi

characters.name: Kahmunrah
characters.notes: Recast; originally played by Hank Azaria; Ahkmenrah's villainous older brother

characters.name: Theodore Roosevelt
characters.notes: Recast; originally played by the late Robin Williams

characters.name: Joan of Arc
characters.notes: New character; has visions that help Nick

characters.name: Jedediah
characters.notes: Recast; originally voiced by Owen Wilson; cowboy from Old West diorama

characters.name: Octavius
characters.notes: Recast; originally voiced by Steve Coogan; Roman general

characters.name: Sacagawea
characters.notes: Recast; originally played by Mizuo Peck

characters.name: Attila the Hun
characters.notes: Recast; originally played by Patrick Gallagher

characters.name: Seth
characters.notes: Egyptian God of Chaos; helps Kahmunrah

characters.name: Erica Daley
characters.notes: Recast; originally played by Kim Raver; Nick's mother

characters.name: Dr. McPhee
characters.notes: Recast; originally played by Ricky Gervais

characters.name: Ahkmenrah
characters.notes: Recast; originally played by Rami Malek; good pharaoh brother

characters.name: George Washington
characters.notes: Appears from 'Washington Crossing the Delaware' painting

characters.name: Dexter
characters.notes: Originally portrayed by Crystal the Monkey

characters.name: Moai (Easter Island Head)
characters.notes: Recast; originally voiced by Brad Garrett

characters.name: Merenkahre
characters.notes: Recast; originally played by Ben Kingsley; Kahmunrah's father

characters.name: Ra
characters.notes: Egyptian Sun God

characters.name: Ms. Montefusco
characters.notes: Nick's teacher who sees promise in him

characters.name: Mia
characters.notes: Nick's school crush

characters.name: Rexy
characters.notes: Non-speaking; guards the museum

diary_of_a_wimpy_kid_the_last_straw_2025.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Last Straw
diary_of_a_wimpy_kid_the_last_straw_2025.based_on: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Last Straw (Book 3) by Jeff Kinney
diary_of_a_wimpy_kid_the_last_straw_2025.production_notes: Fourth animated film but adapts third book. Delayed from original plans due to 2023 SAG-AFTRA strikes. Directed by Matt Danner (Night at the Museum: Kahmunrah Rises Again).
